questions.questionEn: What is the value of x in the equation: 3x + 2y = 12 and x - y = 1?
questions.questionHi: समीकरण में x का मान क्या है: 3x + 2y = 12 और x - y = 1?
questions.subject: quantitative-aptitude
questions.explanation: From x - y = 1, we get y = x - 1. Substituting in first equation: 3x + 2(x-1) = 12, so 5x = 14, x = 2.8 ≈ 3
